ch0110_90_kasumi/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I had a feeling
you’d show!
ch0110_90_kasumi/0101_0701_02_10:
If you want a battle, I’m always ready!
With Starmie, I’ll be on an all-out offensive!
ch0110_90_kasumi/7101_0701_01_10:
My policy for battle is—and always will
be—an all-out offensive with Water-type
Pokémon!
ch0110_90_kasumi/7101_0701_02_10:
I think Arceus saw me stick to that policy,
and that’s why it acknowledged me!
ch0110_90_kasumi/7101_0701_03_10:
It was as if all of my hard work paid off.
I felt so motivated!
ch0110_90_kasumi/7102_0701_01_10:
Starmie’s core glows brightly in seven colors,
so its nickname is “the gem of the sea.”
ch0110_90_kasumi/7102_0701_02_10:
I guess now that we’ve awakened our
arc suit, it’ll shine even brighter!
ch0110_90_kasumi/7103_0701_01_10:
I wonder if I can use my arc suit even while
wearing a swimsuit!
ch0110_90_kasumi/7103_0701_02_10:
It would be fun to swim in the ocean in an
arc suit, even just once!
ch0110_90_kasumi/7103_0701_03_10: I’m serious! It’s important to always try!
ch0110_90_kasumi/7104_0701_01_10:
Starmie’s my partner—and who understands
me best.
ch0110_90_kasumi/7104_0701_02_10:
When I get worked up, it helps me chill out
by splashing water on me. It’s always there
for me.
ch0110_90_kasumi/7104_0701_03_10:
I guess you could say that makes us the
chillest sync pair!
ch0110_90_kasumi/7105_0701_01_10:
I don’t just want to deepen my bond with my
partner Pokémon. I also wanna deepen my
bond with you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0110_90_kasumi/7105_0701_02_10:
I’ll keep gaining more experience here on
Pasio...
ch0110_90_kasumi/7105_0701_03_10:
so we can show everyone our teamwork
shines brighter than an arc suit!
ch0110_90_kasumi/1701_0701_01_10:
I’m so glad to see you! I wanted to give
you this.
ch0110_90_kasumi/1701_0702_01_10:
You know you can lean on me in a pinch,
right? I’m here to help!
ch0110_90_kasumi/2501_0701_01_10:
I heard Arceus can change its type.
Did you know that?
ch0110_90_kasumi/2501_0701_03_10:
I’d have it go on an all-out offensive with
some WILD Water-type moves!
ch0110_90_kasumi/2501_0702_01_10:
Even with Arceus, I wouldn’t bend my policy
one bit!
ch0110_90_kasumi/2501_0702_02_10:
I just wouldn’t be me if I did—even if it’s a
Legendary Pokémon.
ch0110_90_kasumi/2511_0701_01_10:
It’s kinda scary how big the world is—but
exciting, too!
ch0110_90_kasumi/2511_0701_02_10:
If you don’t jump out of the pool and into
the big, wide ocean, you’ll miss all sorts
of things!
ch0110_90_kasumi/2511_0701_03_10: That’s why I’m so glad I came to Pasio.
ch0110_90_kasumi/2511_0702_01_10:
It’s important to know how my skill measures
up here!
ch0110_90_kasumi/2511_0702_02_10:
It’s good to see how big the gap is between
me and my goals. It gives me motivation!
ch0110_90_kasumi/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Just so you know, I’m always
ready if you need someone to battle!
ch0110_90_kasumi/3003_0701_01_10:
I got to swim, eat lunch, take a nap...
Nothing could be better!
ch0110_90_kasumi/3005_0701_01_10:
Watching the ocean on a quiet night
is so relaxing...
